snippet.title: Days After - the official trailer
snippet.description:
As a lone survivor of the zombie apocalypse, you must stay alive by hunting, crafting and building. Are you the last survivor of the human race?

Days After is a free zombie survival game where you will collect resources through hunting, foraging and mining. You will build your shelter, and defend yourself from zombie hordes, vicious wildlife and other threats. Craft clothes, weapons, food, drink and tools and explore the world in your quest for survival and the truth. You are a lone survivor… but are you the last one?
